channel.title: Project-PVP 711 ll Great PvP ll Full Godwars And Skilling ll *UPDATED SOURCE*
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/yHWNt.png[/img]
[size=12pt]SOURCE UPDATED.[/size]
Hey guys! This is my server i was about to host, i basically quit because i got no time to code this due to school and loads of exams coming up. I wish all the best to whoever uses my source. :) [size=14pt]I GIVE NO ONE PERMISSION TO RELEASE THIS ON ANY OTHER SITE/FORUM. THIS IS FOR MOPAR USERS ONLY.[/size] [size=12pt]DOWNLOAD LINKS: http://uppit.com/ctz70l5eaqgl/Project-PVP_Source.rar OR http://uppit.com/ctz70l5eaqgl/Project-PVP_Source.rar[/size]
Things i did: - Added Server Sided Messages - Added PvP System, just add the pvp shop with the fog token id. - Added Zamorak and Armadyl bosses with Perfect Drops - Added ::crabs (rock crabs for training) - Added 100% fully working JAD with Drops! - Added lots of Shops ( some npcs at home wont be able to trade because i removed the store but the npcs are there..to make them work just go into The unspawndedshops and add the shop) - Fixed the trade abit more with the 2nd part of the trade - All skills working perfect except dungeoneering. - Fixed summoning, just add a shop for it and get started :) & Alot More i cbf to name. I have really tough exams coming up and due to that i quit coding. Ill still be on mopar though. Anyways, i havent uploaded the cache with the source because my pc's bitching. So yeah, to make it work just download any 667/711 cache, and add it into data/cache. If theres no folder, create one and add.
MEDIA: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WWXPh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0VzIp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qhJbr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6LgBU.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Oo9qB.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pSJbY.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2nKPN.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XvVMW.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HrXIq.png[/img] [center]Credits: Matrix Team- 60% Me-40% I dont really know anyone else who contributed,so yeah.[/center] [size=10pt]Note: I acknowledge some of my work is a snip or tut, but still its "some" not "all", so yeah. :)[/size] If theres any problem please post it on this thread, and if i have the time, ill be happy to help. Its just that i made this thread really quick, so forgive me for any typo error. My parents shut the internet and i have like 5 mins to go lol. so yeah, all the best to everyone that uses this!Also, use any 667 client..it doesnt matter! :)
Thanks!
[size=6pt]For any help please contact me via a PM or Msn. :)[/size]

item.title: Project-PVP 711 ll Great PvP ll Full Godwars And Skilling ll *UPDATED SOURCE*
item.dc:creator: @ApocalypseX ApocalypseX
item.description:
@ApocalypseX wrote:

This is horrible.
Not malicious wise, but all 602+'s loading whatever revision cache always are buggy as hell and not very stable.
But nice work!

Master claw:

whats the item call so you can hit 3000+?

here’s a ::god command… It works. Add it under Commands.java under administratorCommands, then type ::god ingame. Gives you 5000 each bonus.


			if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("god")) {
				player.setHitpoints(Short.MAX_VALUE);
				player.getEquipment().setEquipmentHpIncrease(
						Short.MAX_VALUE - 990);
				for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)
					player.getCombatDefinitions().getBonuses()[i] = 5000;
				for (int i = 14; i < player.getCombatDefinitions().getBonuses().length; i++)
					player.getCombatDefinitions().getBonuses()[i] = 5000;
				return true;
			}
snipetay205:

How do you set yourself as the owner? sorry this is the first time ive tried to run a rsps

Go Into Player.Java

Search

public void init(Session session, String username, int displayMode, int screenWidth, int screenHeight) {

Then, after finding it, go to the bottom and find the bracket and Copy & Paste this there

if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("Your Name Here")) { rights = 2; }
^ the name there might be his. Change it to yours.

Read full topic

[quote=“MyRsPs, post:67, topic:443899”]1st - Ema, its Chris - YOUR CODER, any credits to me?

2nd - Credits to Chronicscape from R-U-N-E-L-O-C-US

3rd - This should not be released without permission from me or chronicscape

4th - No backdoors are fixed

5th - :mad: -facepalm-[/quote]

Ema doesnt deserve credits nor does the secondary coder that supposedly made this… All you did was rename a few things… You kept my shops for the most part. My npcs are still in places only i would put them. Ema fyi karma can be a ho…
